price: Sila (Rabbiin akkas godhe) sun du'aa jiraachisuu irratti danda'aa mitii?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
